requirements.name: Safe Attachments should be enabled
requirements.description: Safe Attachments analyzes attachments for malicious content

requirements.name: Safe Links should be enabled
requirements.description: Safe Links provides time-of-click verification of URLs in emails and Office documents

requirements.name: Anti-phishing policies should be configured
requirements.description: Anti-phishing protection detects attempts to impersonate users and domains

requirements.name: Anti-spam policies should be configured
requirements.description: Configure anti-spam policies to filter spam and malicious emails

requirements.name: Alert policies should be configured
requirements.description: Configure alert policies to notify administrators of suspicious activities

requirements.name: Authorized sender lists should be regularly reviewed
requirements.description: Review and maintain authorized sender lists to prevent spoofing
